entry.title: In India's Landmark Same-Sex Marriage Case, Arguments Span Equality, Family, Religion
entry.content: Petitioners seeking marriage rights for LGBTQ people face opposition from Indiaâ€™s socially conservative government.

entry.title: American Doctor Killed in Sudan Stayed to Treat His Patients as Bombs Fell
entry.content: Iowa native Bushra Ibnauf Sulieman, director of the Faculty of Medicine at the University of Khartoum, was fatally stabbed this week amid lawlessness unleashed by a power struggle between two generals.
